title: Jonathan Sidi
text: Fifteen years of consulting for a diverse client base providing solutions in the fields of Clinical development, Health Economics, Macroeconomics, Macroprudential Stability, and Criminology.

title: Jonathan Sidi
text:
Education
PhD in Statistics, Hebrew University in Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Israel

title: Jonathan Sidi
text:

title: Pinpoint Solutions
text: Pinpoint Solutions offers a wide range of open-source and proprietary tools designed to address common data science and organizational challenges. The comprehensive library includes advanced packages and scripts written in R, JavaScript and Stan. These tools provide enhanced data visualization tools, package management, collaboration tools and statistical modeling.

title: Pinpoint Solutions
text:
Ensembles
Our proprietary software streamlines project management, enhances collaboration, and ensures data security.

title: Pinpoint Solutions
text:
Open Source
Through active engagement with the open-source community and continuous research, Pinpoint Solutions remains at the forefront of technological advancements, providing practical and up-to-date solutions for businesses.
R Packages that are developed by Pinpoint Solutions that are on CRAN and GitHub

Package Development: sinew, covrpage, reactor, tidycheckUsage
Reproducibility: carbonate, whereami, snapper, gdigest
Shiny Applications: ggedit, shinyHeatmaply, regexSelect, carbonace, CIMDO
Communication: slackverse
Utilities: details, shredder, rsam, bplyr, vcs
Statistical Modeling: lmmen
Htmlwidgets: slickR, jsTree, d3Tree, shinyCanvas, rpdf

R Packages that are developed by Pinpoint Solutions in collaboration with external groups

ggeasy, ggalt, mmrm, mmrm.brms, remedy, slackr

title: Pinpoint Analytics
text:
At Pinpoint Strategies, we decode intricate data puzzles, crafting actionable insights through advanced modeling and intuitive visualizations.
We specialize in simplifying complex data landscapes, empowering your organization to make informed decisions with confidence. With our expertise, your data becomes a strategic asset, guiding your path to success. Partner with us and elevate your decision-making journey to new heights.


Ingesting, interrogating and combining complex data is the cornerstone of understanding your data and gaining insights to both the planned questions and the questions discovered along the journey.



Communicating the underlying structures within the data can take on many forms. Pinpoint Analytics provides the agility of moving fluidly from a variety of presentation modes from standard static outputs to advanced interactive web applications.



Collaborating with our clients on understanding what drives their decision making we develop tailored modeling and simulation solutions that will empower them with in depth insights and increased confidence.

Insights, Efficiency and Innovation

title: Pinpoint Thinking
text:
Pinpoint offers coaching and strategy services, empowering clients to navigate complex data science and clinical development challenges.
This includes efficiently identifying data inconsistencies, taking corrective actions, integrating relational data to address crucial questions, and designing resilient and reliable data science pipelines for streamlined deployment.



CNS endpoint strategy: Major Depressive Disorders, Postpartum Depression, General Anxiety Disorder, Huntington’s Disease, Parkinson’s Disease, Alzheimer’s Disease, Essential tremor disorders





Simulation concepts and strategies
Introductory and Advanced Bayesian Data Analysis
Go/No-Go criteria modeling
Sample Size estimation





Data science basic and advanced concepts
Ingesting, Cleaning and Interrogating structured and unstructured data
Structuring pipelines for reproducible workflows
Communicating concepts and results to team members, decision makers and non-technical audiences
Developing interactive applications with Shiny and D3.js





Working in High Performance Computing (HPC) environments
Setting up cloud computing workstations
